Class Picture

java.lang.Object
  SimplePicture
      Picture
All Implemented Interfaces:
DigitalPicture
public class Picture
extends SimplePicture

A class that represents a picture. This class inherits from SimplePicture and allows the student to add functionality to the Picture class. Simple Starting class for student use - MA

Author:
Barbara Ericson ericson@cc.gatech.edu, Edited by Attan
